experience.title: Lead Sales Associate
responsibilities: Provide personalized styling recommendations to customers, consistently exceeding individual monthly sales targets by 15%.
Process complex transactions including returns, exchanges, and loyalty program enrollments using POS systems.
Oversee floor merchandising and stock replenishment to ensure optimal product presentation and accessibility.

experience.title: Retail Sales Intern
responsibilities: Assisted senior sales staff in high-volume departments, focusing on customer engagement and product knowledge.
Managed fitting room traffic and organized inventory to maintain a premium shopping environment.
Participated in comprehensive training on customer conflict resolution and consultative selling techniques.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
